abstract: Investors welcomed the upcoming departure of Biogen Idec‘s chief executive, James Mullen, sending the company’s shares higher in early trading on Tuesday.
snippet: Investors welcomed the upcoming departure of Biogen Idec‘s chief executive, James Mullen, sending the company’s shares higher in early trading on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Investors welcomed the upcoming departure of Biogen Idec‘s chief executive, James Mullen, sending the company’s shares higher in early trading on Tuesday, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Investors Cheer Departure of Biogen Chief
